name: METAL BIM SOLID
description:
METAL BIM SOLID is a parody game of METAL GEAR SOLID.

This game was created for the GDU Jam 4, with inside jokes from the community.

Testimonials "That was the best thing I've ever played" - Bim Buswick Credits
  • Angelee - Programming, Art, Level Design
  • som1chan - Programming, Music, Sound Design, Writing
  • Bim - Voice Acting Grunts and Screams
